1: I unite with my family to face challenges together.
2: I prioritize those I love in the journey ahead.
3: I show respect and humility to my loved ones.
4: I embrace others with love and share joyful moments.
5: I joyfully recognize the blessings of my family.
6: I welcome others with respect and create joyful connections.
7: I unite with my loved ones in respect and honor.
8: I seek to earn favor through my generous gifts.
9: I have enough and share my abundance with others.
10: I appreciate your kindness and feel blessed by our meeting.
11: I embrace my blessings and share them generously.
12: I lead the way as we journey together.
13: I care for my young and all living creatures.
14: I guide gently, ensuring everyone can keep up with me.
15: I seek to find grace in the sight of others.
16: I move forward on my journey with purpose and grace.
17: I create a welcoming place for my family and livestock.
18: I settle peacefully in a welcoming new place.
19: I invest in my future by securing my own land.
20: I build a place to honor my faith.
